extract.html: Monochromatic light λ = 520 nm passes through a narrow single slit of width a = 20 μm. Fraunhofer diffraction pattern is observed on a distant screen.

questions.prompt: Q1. State the condition for the first minimum in single-slit Fraunhofer diffraction.
Q2. For small angles, estimate θ for first minimum (radians). Use a·θ ≈ λ.
Q3. If the slit is made narrower, what happens to central maximum width?
